headline: Digital Evidence Across Borders and Engagement with Non-U.S. Authorities
keywords: Legal, Politics, Abuse, Due Process, Community
description: Since we first started reporting in 2013, our transparency report has focused on requests from U.S. law enforcement. Previous versions of the report noted that, as a U.S. company, we ask non-U.S. law enforcement agencies to obtain formal U.S. legal process before providing customer data.
